mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, qna_no, qna_section, qna_subject, qna_writer, qna_regdate, qna_ref, qna_step, qna_depth, qna_view from (select * from qna order by qna_ref desc, qna_step asc))where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_no, qna_writer, qna_subject, qna_content, qna_regdate, qna_update_date, qna_ref, qna_step, qna_depth, qna_section) values(qna_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, qna_seq.nextval, 0, 0, #{section})

insert into qna(qna_no, qna_writer, qna_subject, qna_content, qna_regdate, qna_update_date, qna_ref, qna_step, qna_depth, qna_section) values(qna_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{ref},#{step}+1,#{depth}+1, #{section})
mapper.update: update qna set qna_step=qna_step+1 where qna_ref=#{ref} and qna_step > #{step}
update qna set qna_view=qna_view+1 where qna_no=#{no}
update qna set qna_writer=#{writer}, qna_subject=#{subject}, qna_content=#{content}, qna_update_date=sysdate, qna_section=#{section} where qna_no=#{no}
